entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Double Bed Frame
Price: 1079.99

Two-tone finish in white wash replicated worn through paint with authentic touch and a replicated wood grained block pattern with authentic touch. entry.title: Jorstad - Double Upholstered Sleigh Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Double Bed Frame
Price: 549.99

With a clean light gray finish flowing over the classic Louis Phillippe styling, the “Jorstad” bedroom collection flawlessly captures the essence of relaxed traditional design. The ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet along with the upholstered panel sleigh headboard with a textural gray-white fabric adorned with nail head detailing creates a beautiful bedroom collection you’ll be proud to own.

Made with Birch veneers and select hardwood solids and finished in a light gray paint for clean and crisp appearance. Classic Louis Phillippe styling with ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet. Sleigh bed has an upholstered panel with a textural gray-white fabric with nail head detailing.

Jorstad - Gray - Full UPH Sleigh HDBD/FTBD

entry.title: Huey Vineyard - Double Sleigh Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Double Bed Frame
Price: 599.99

With sophisticated style and a dark finish, the "Huey Vineyard" bedroom collection is sure to enhance your bedroom's decor with a rich traditional design that offers a warm comfortable atmosphere. The trendy replicated black paint finish beautifully bathes the stylish curved footboard and shapely rails and moulding in a smooth beauty that perfectly captures the rich traditional style. With the antique pewter color metal hardware perfectly complementing the Louis Philippe style, this collection fits comfortably into any bedroom decor. Enhance the style of any bedroom with the rich traditional beauty of the "Huey Vineyard" bedroom collection.

Louis Philippe styling. Trendy replicated black paint. Shapely top mouldings on the case pieces.

Curvaceous footboard panel caped with an elegant sleigh rail.

entry.title: Nashburg - Double Metal Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Double Bed Frame
Price: 449.99

Country cottage. Farmhouse chic. Vintage industrial. However you see it, you’re sure to be instantly charmed by this retro-inspired full metal bed. Finished in an aged pewter-tone, its steel frame with moulded "fittings" brilliantly mimics wrought-iron beds from yesteryear. Let yourself drift away to a simpler time and place. Mattress and foundation/box spring available, sold separately.

Product Features
  • Made of steel
  • Includes headboard, footboard, rails and slats
  • Aged pewter-tone finish
  • Assembly required
  • Mattress and foundation/box spring available, sold separately

About Nashburg
Whether it’s the welded tubular metal in a bronze color powder coat finish, the welded tubular and sheet metal in a brushed pewter color finish or the welded tubular and sheet metal in a bronze color finish adorned with cushions covered in twill weave oatmeal color fabric, the “Metal Beds” collection features moulded metal accents and a rich vintage design perfect to enhance the beauty of any home.
